迎.definition: to welcome; to meet; to forge ahead (esp. in the face of difficulties); to meet face to face

迎佛骨.definition: to ceremonially receive a bone relic of the Buddha

迎來.definition: to welcome (a visitor or newcomer); (fig.) to usher in

迎來送往.definition: lit. to meet those arriving, to send of those departing (idiom); busy entertaining guests; all time taken over with social niceties

迎刃而解.definition: lit. (bamboo) splits when it meets the knife's edge (idiom); fig. easily solved

迎合.definition: to cater to; to pander to

迎娶.definition: (of a groom) to fetch one's bride from her parents' home to escort her to the wedding ceremony; (fig.) to take as one's wife; to marry (a woman)

迎客松.definition: Greeting Pine, symbol of Huangshan 黃山|黄山[Huang2 shan1]

迎擊.definition: to face an attack; to repulse the enemy

迎新.definition: to see in the New Year; to welcome new guests; by extension, to receive new students

迎江.definition: Yingjiang, a district of Anqing City 安慶市|安庆市[An1qing4 Shi4], Anhui

迎江區.definition: Yingjiang, a district of Anqing City 安慶市|安庆市[An1qing4 Shi4], Anhui

迎澤.definition: Yingze district of Taiyuan city 太原市[Tai4 yuan2 shi4], Shanxi

迎澤區.definition: Yingze district of Taiyuan city 太原市[Tai4 yuan2 shi4], Shanxi

迎神賽會.definition: folk festival, esp. involving shrine or image of God

迎親.definition: (of the groom's family) to send a bridal sedan chair 花轎|花轿 to fetch the bride; to send a party to escort the bride to the groom's house

迎賓.definition: to welcome a guest; to entertain a customer (of prostitute)

迎難而上.definition: (idiom) to press on in the face of challenges

迎面.definition: directly; head-on (collision); (of wind) in one's face

迎面而來.definition: directly; head-on (collision); in one's face (of wind)

迎頭兒.definition: erhua variant of 迎頭|迎头[ying2 tou2]

迎頭痛擊.definition: to deliver a frontal assault; to meet head-on (idiom)

迎頭趕上.definition: to try hard to catch up

迎風.definition: in the wind; facing the wind; downwind
